recipe.title: Salsa Verde
ingredients: 1/3 cup coarsely crumbled firm white sandwich bread
2 tablespoons drained bottled capers, finely chopped
1 garlic clove, minced and mashed to a paste with 1/4 teaspoon salt
1/3 cup finely chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley
1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh tarragon, or to taste
instructions: Mash together bread crumbs, vinegar, capers, garlic paste, anchovy paste, and mustard using a mortar and pestle (or whisk together in a bowl).
Add herbs, oil, and salt and pepper to taste, then stir (or whisk) until combined well.
